reviewText: What was on the DVD was glorious, but it could have been more. The art was magnificent, the music was superb, the DVD quality was excellent.  I have somewhat of a music background, so did not need any explanation of the music and could follow the biography easily.  However, I know nothing about art and was disappointed that we were not told about the depicted work of art or the artist. For me, it would have been much more meaningful. Nevertheless, I loved it - but couldn't give it a 5.
